name: Bloody Cell Episodes 1-4
description:
Bloody Cell Episodes 1-4
Bloody cell is a genre hopping platformer with hand drawn backgrounds and clay animated characters
play through the adventure of bloody cell a red organism and veture through portals found in each stage paying homage to gamings most classic franchises
god of war,call of duty, super meat boy and more

this was the first project i made three years ago AND IS BY NO MEANS FINISHED ( to be honest even I think this was kind of crap.
